DIY Dental Solutions: Create a line of do-it-yourself dental products, such as toothpaste, floss, and mouthwash, that are made from natural ingredients and are easy to use at home. Offer tutorials and recipes on how to use these products effectively.

Virtual Dental Consultations: Develop a virtual platform that allows people to connect with licensed dentists remotely. Offer video consultations, virtual cleanings, and remote monitoring of oral health.

Community Dental Co-ops: Create a network of community-based dental co-ops where people can share resources and expertise to maintain their oral health. Offer workshops and training sessions on how to properly care for teeth and gums.

Personalized Oral Health Kits: Develop a line of personalized oral health kits that include everything needed to maintain good oral hygiene, such as toothbrushes, toothpaste, floss, and mouthwash. Offer customized recommendations based on individual needs and preferences.
